programme.title: The Circuit

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Ahead of Google's developer conference I/O, Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down exclusively with Bloomberg Originals host and executive producer Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Google's AI models.

programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents in Los Angeles on the set of his new movie for a look at the YouTube star's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creators economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming his platform into an entertainment giant to rival Netflix.

programme.title: The Business Traveler Show
programme.desc: On this episode, get an exclusive look inside United Airlines' all-new business class, learn how to spend your free day in Amsterdam, hear about the rise of high-speed US rail and take a trip across the Atlantic with Iberia Airlines.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, and most intelligent robots and questions whether the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improves the human experience or ends it.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: Emily Chang explores the future of connections with the machines and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing human capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way people use their minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology; exploring the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how people die.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Finance is an industry dominated by men, but women are rising and controlling more wealth globally; how did the women of Wall Street break through, and what's changing now that they have?

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Wall Street pros often play poker, chess, blackjack and other games that rely on skills that are highly transferable to their work; the lines between finance and gaming are blurring faster than ever.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: There's been a migration of financial powerbrokers to South Florida in recent years, drawn by the weather, light regulation and low taxes; it's hard to imagine the capital of finance leaving New York, but Wall Street South is getting bigger.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Building wealth used to follow a formula, but these days it's easier than ever to play the markets. With investing tools at everyone's fingertips, is it a chance for generational wealth or a siren call for suckers?

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia; but this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Brazil's largest bank robbery; at the heart of the brazen heist is South America's most dangerous gang and its raid on what's is known as the Night of Terror.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom; but behind the luxury lifestyles and Instagram hype, thousands found themselves inside a multi-level marketing maze that left many broke and broken.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are under surveillance as the latest developments in finance, economics and investment is covered; Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests create some intriguing conversation.

programme.desc: Bloomberg's Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney harness the power of Bloomberg Intelligence to provide in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.

programme.title: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Focusing on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the worlds of business and finance and the interesting stories of global technology, politics, economics and more.
